summary: Sixpence None the Richer  is an American Christian rock/pop band.
full_text: Sixpence None the Richer  is an American Christian rock/pop band that formed in New Braunfels, Texas, eventually settling in Nashville, Tennessee. They are best known for their songs "Kiss Me" and "Breathe Your Name" and their covers of "Don't Dream It's Over" and "There She Goes". The name of the band is inspired by a passage from the book Mere Christianity by C. S. Lewis.
title: Sixpence None The Richer
